alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 11 at 12:28PM AKST until November 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Waves will push onshore, especially along south and west facing shores. Peak water levels will occur Monday night into Tuesday. Sustained southwest winds 25 to 35 mph late Sunday through Monday will shift to the west Monday night.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property. Items on the beach should be moved to higher ground to prevent damage or being washed away.
